nodes.text: Carruthian brandy was a rare type of brandy. While residing in the capital city Myrra on the Outer Rim planet Akiva in around 34 ABY, retired pilots Wedge Antilles and Norra Wexley kept a case of Carruthian brandy in their home's study room. It was displayed in a shelf next to a framed box in which Antilles displayed the medals he had earned for his days in the Rebellion.
Carruthian brandy appeared in Resistance Reborn, a 2019 novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
